TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFactoryParameters

Docs.summary: Interface to retrieve a parameter value from factory parameter collection of speech factory.

Docs.typeparam: The type of parameter. only string, int and bool are supported.
Docs.summary: Returns value of the parameter in type . The parameter must have the same type as . Currently only string, int and bool are allowed. If the parameter value is not defined, a default value is returned: an empty string if is string, 0 if is int, and false if is bool.
